definition: (Korean term) women who returned to Korea after being abducted during the Manchu invasions of Korea in the 17th century, only to be regarded as defiled and therefore ostracized, even by their own families
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)
